project.objective:
Ensure that a software project's dependencies like language, framework and platforms are easily replaceable. The replacement can be automatic or manual. Ensure that the software project is valid and only uses certain features, that makes it easy to migrate the project. Standardize usage of Java feature by defining a subset of valid Java grammar and checking it. Use different Grammar for Dem and subsequent projects, because Dem is the base for subsequent projects, which should have higher restriction.
Always translate code to other language automatically and test it, in order to be sure that the code is portable.
